message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but I'm willing to share some of the wealth.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider that the value diminishes rapidly for both of us as we delay.

Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise. This offer is still in my favor, but it gives you a larger share than before. We need to come to an agreement before the value of our money drops further.
Alice, time is running out!  My offer is more than fair considering the rapid devaluation. Let's settle this now before we both lose out even more.
